Title: Requires all agencies of the city of New York which issue summons to document violations with photographic evidence when feasible
Summary: Requires all agencies of the city of New York which issue summons to document violations with photographic evidence when feasible.
LawCode: Add Title 7 Chap 10 ยง7-1001, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring all city agencies issuing summonses to document violations by photographic evidence when possible and practicable
